alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 11:47PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN WAKULLA... JEFFERSON...NORTHWESTERN TAYLOR...EASTERN LEON...MADISON... SOUTHWESTERN LOWNDES...SOUTHERN THOMAS AND BROOKS COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 AM EDT... At 1146 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Quitman, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Monticello, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Madison, Florida A and M, Quitman, Thomasville, Lake Park, Valdosta, Boston, Pavo, Doak Campbell Stadium, I-75 At Exit 16, Greenville, Morven, Barwick, Alma, and Cody. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Madison
